description: A trusted Directorate agent meets Daria outside Bar 101 and receives a secure data wipe utility, tailored for selective record erasure.
Reports spread of loyal citizens quietly having their compliance histories wiped and privileges restored; low scorers see no change, fueling quiet resentment.
A strict curfew is announced, with Directorate patrols and scanning drones reappearing across the city, signaling a visible return to order.
